member.name: T:Microsoft.AspNet.Diagnostics.CompilationFailure
member.summary: Describes a failure compiling a specific file.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.Diagnostics.CompilationFailure.SourceFilePath
member.summary: Path of the file that produced the compilation failure.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.Diagnostics.CompilationFailure.CompiledContent
member.remarks: For templated files, the represents the original content and represents the transformed content. This property can be null if the exception is encountered during transformation.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.Diagnostics.CompilationFailure.Messages
member.summary: Gets a sequence of produced as a result of compilation.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.Diagnostics.DiagnosticMessage.SourceFilePath
member.summary: Path of the file that produced the message.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.Diagnostics.DiagnosticMessage.StartLine
member.summary: Gets the one-based line index for the start of the compilation error.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.Diagnostics.DiagnosticMessage.StartColumn
member.summary: Gets the zero-based column index for the start of the compilation error.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.Diagnostics.DiagnosticMessage.EndLine
member.summary: Gets the one-based line index for the end of the compilation error.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.Diagnostics.DiagnosticMessage.EndColumn
member.summary: Gets the zero-based column index for the end of the compilation error.

member.name: T:Microsoft.AspNet.Diagnostics.ICompilationException
member.summary: Specifies the contract for an exception representing compilation failure.
member.remarks: This interface is implemented on exceptions thrown during compilation to enable consumers to read compilation-related data out of the exception

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.Diagnostics.ICompilationException.CompilationFailures
member.summary: Gets a sequence of with compilation failures.

member.name: T:Microsoft.AspNet.Diagnostics.IStatusCodePagesFeature
member.summary: Represents the Status code pages feature.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.Diagnostics.IStatusCodePagesFeature.Enabled
member.summary: Indicates if the status code middleware will handle responses.
